titles.title: Better is one day in Your courts, Lord,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Better is one day in Your courts, Lord,
Than a thousand somewhere else,
Better to be resting in Your dwelling place
Than be living by myself;
I would rather be a doorkeeper in the house of The Lord
Than to dwell in the tents of wickedness,
Better is one day in Your courts, Lord,
Than a thousand somewhere else.
